title: Frame drops.
body: For the past three or four patches my frames have been dropping to as low as 5 fps every time I'm in a teamfight. It's perfectly fine when nothing's really going on, or I'm farming, but the moment I hit a teamfight, or there's more than 3 people fighting at once they go down almost completely. It normally fixes a week after the patch hits live, but I'm getting pretty sick of this. Is there a permanent fix?

replies.body:
FPS issues are commonly caused by driver problems or hardware failure. I strongly recommend working through the steps outlined in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a first step. 

Let me know if those steps help resolve this.

I took a look at it and the very first thing I tried was cleaning up my computer files. Thank god it worked, I was about to go crazy. 

Thanks so much!
